intro.description: Want to take control of your finances?

about.title: About Finance Flow
about.content: Finance Flow is your ultimate personal finance tracker designed to help you manage your expenses, budget effectively, and achieve financial freedom. Our easy-to-use platform offers comprehensive tools for tracking your spending, setting financial goals, and gaining insights into your financial health.

features.title: Expense Tracking
features.description: Easily track your daily expenses and categorize your spending.

features.title: Goals Management
features.description: Record your goals, both long and short term.

features.title: Budget Planning
features.description: Set monthly budgets to stay on top of your finances.

features.title: Financial Reports
features.description: Generate insightful reports to analyze your spending habits.

testimonials.quote: "Finance Flow has completely changed the way I manage my money. It's easy to use and has helped me save more each month!"
testimonials.author: - Pulkit Patel

testimonials.quote: "I love the budgeting feature. It keeps me on track with my financial goals."
testimonials.author: - Sahil Mudgil
